description.@en: The wheel turns and turns, in favor of the just and the unjust alike.

data.notes:
Lawbreaker Trait

Professions of this Archetype are typically oath breakers or on the run from something or someone. They deal in lies, steal from the unwary and rabble-rouse to earn their keep, and with nothing to lose, they have little to fear.

effect.@en: Anytime you generate a Critical Failure, gain a Coin for yourself. Once spent, discard it permanently. It must be used before the end of the game session, or else it expires.
